plot: Gay Street Therapy answers those burning questions that you've had but have always been afraid to ask. Brandy and Julie spent an evening at Sur Lounge in Los Angeles to help lesbians with their problems giving advice with a side of humor.
plot_en: Gay Street Therapy answers those burning questions that you've had but have always been afraid to ask. Brandy and Julie spent an evening at Sur Lounge in Los Angeles to help lesbians with their problems giving advice with a side of humor.

title: Gay Street Therapy
